alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:07PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery County through 645 PM CDT... At 607 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oden, or 13 miles west of Mount Ida, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Mauldin... Pencil Bluff... Pine Ridge... Sims... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations
